Package fate.core.Email

Class Email

java.lang.Object
fate.core.Email.Email
public class Email extends Object
Common class for general eMail functionality. This class uses MS Exchange server.

  • Method Details

    • getMailInfos

      public static List<EMailData> getMailInfos(ITestData user, String queryString)
      Returns information about the emails matched by a query string.
      Parameters:
      user - Email User.
      queryString - Query string for wanted emails. Query Documentation
      Returns:
      Information about the requested emails. Return emails received yesterday or today "Received:yesterday..today" Returns all emails

    • downloadAllAttachments

      public static void downloadAllAttachments(ITestData user, microsoft.exchange.webservices.data.core.enumeration.property.WellKnownFolderName folder, String emailsSubject, String pathWhereToSaveAttachments)
      Downloads all email attachments to wanted directory. Any attachment with the same name will be overwritten!
      Parameters:
      user - Email User.
      folder - Wanted inbox folder.
      emailsSubject - Subject of wanted EMail.
      pathWhereToSaveAttachments - Path where to save attachments.

    • getContentOfEmail

      public static String getContentOfEmail(ITestData user, microsoft.exchange.webservices.data.core.enumeration.property.WellKnownFolderName folder, String emailsSubject)
      Returns text of email with wanted subject.
      Parameters:
      user - Email User.
      emailsSubject - Emails subject.
      Returns:
      Emails content as text.

    • isEmailExists

      public static boolean isEmailExists(ITestData user, microsoft.exchange.webservices.data.core.enumeration.property.WellKnownFolderName folder, String subject)
      Checks if wanted folder contains an email with wanted subject.
      Parameters:
      user - Email User.
      folder - Folder where to search.
      subject - Subject to look for.
      Returns:
      boolean value.

      public static void deleteEmail(ITestData user, microsoft.exchange.webservices.data.core.enumeration.property.WellKnownFolderName folder, String subject)

      folder - Wanted folder.

    • sendEmail

      public static void sendEmail(ITestData user, String email, String subject, String text)
      Sends wanted mail to wanted address.
      Parameters:
      user - Email User.
      email - Recipients email address.
      subject - Emails subject.
      text - Emails content.
